beer.beer_description:
For our first edition of our 2025 Stout
Series we just couldn’t help ourselves.
If you’re reading this then it would appear
that you couldn’t either.
We’ve taken the flavour of the month and
infused it into our signature imperial stout
base by adding a literal trolley load of
Belgian speculoos cookies, crushing them
into crumbles, and letting our imperial stout
base sit on them until they completely
dissolved and fermented.
Each luxurious sip is filled with rich dark
chocolate and those sweet, spiced
speculoos cookies, whose name we haven’t
paid the registered trademark for so we’ll
just say they rhyme with Miss Scoff…

items.checkin_comment:
Ooow crunchy biscoff me love 
Crystal sugar  chunks  of golden syrup 
Blackstrap molasses 
 Gentle tang of pine resin 
Subtle mixed  spice 
Loving  Lactose  creates a thick mouth feel 
Great brewing

user.bio: World Traveler, beer lover. If we’re ever in the same location, let me know. I’ll buy you a beer!
user.location: Naples, Italy via San Diego, CA

user.bio: Sorry, not accepting friend requests without reviews

items.badge_description: You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 470 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. You've reached the top!

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 255 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 52!

items.badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 260 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 53!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 205 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 42!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 43)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 215 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 44!

user.bio: I love to try new good things in beer, wine and spirits. Quality trumps quantity. Enjoy reds, barrel aged stouts and haz

items.badge_description: You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 335 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. You've reached the top!

Marshmallow, chocolate, apple pie! Cakes and cookies catch my eye. Churn that butter, twist and shout. Put it in a pastry stout! That’s 135 different beers with the style of Stout - Pastry, Stout - Imperial / Double Pastry, or Sour - Smoothie / Pastry. Check-in to 5 more to get to Level 28.

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 4 years on Untappd!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 50 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 11!
